name: 5th International Conference on Obesity and Diet Imbalance
content: ME Conferences cordially invites you to attend the 5th International Conference on Obesity and Diet Imbalance, which will be held on December 08-09, 2022 in Rome, Italy with the topic "Educate & Strengthen Obesity Prevention via Proper Nutrition and Physical Activities." Participating in Obesity Diet 2022 will provide a unique opportunity to network with world-class Obesity Specialists and Endocrinology Experts in the field, creating a conduit for collaborative efforts and partnerships.
